name: Apex Racer
summary: Build, Customize, Race! Take on the world's best racers as you race through elaborate fast-paced tracks in the most thrilling racing simulation experience on mobile! Inspired by a popular toy that was introduced in Asia back in the 90s. It is a plastic model race car without a remote control. These model race cars are mostly referred to as Mini 4WD due to its all-wheel-drive nature
